CIPHER.0.cipherString: Everybody believes in something and everybody, by virtue of the fact that they believe in something, uses that something to support their own existence.
CIPHER.0.question: Solve this aristocrat.

CIPHER.1.cipherString: Life is one long process of getting tired.
CIPHER.1.question: Decode this quote which has been encoded using the Baconian cipher.
